title: How to Make a Better Shrimp Scampi Recipe
description: Take the classic over the top by tossing in crisp, bouncy potato gnocchi, Melissa Clark writes.
dc:creator: Melissa Clark
media:credit: Kate Sears for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Hadas Smirnoff.
media:description: Gnocchi and shrimp cook in one pan for limited cleanup.
